|pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR5312A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ATTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Vanguard |ram1_model=VG36128161BT-7TL |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR5112A |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=a |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-G,WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-A |default_ssid_regex=^WARPSTAR-[A-F0-9]{6}-G$,,,^WARPSTAR-[A-F0-9]{6}-A$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0D:02 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://121ware.com/product/atermstation/websupport/wr7800h/top.html Support page (JP)]
[http://allabout.co.jp/gm/gc/47100/ On allabout.co.jp] :00:0D:02 OUI ('''NEC''') :'''WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-G''' SSID shown on label
"3028-000861" is silkscreened on the right side of the board. "R1.1" and "ID:28-000071" is silkscreened on the left side of the board. "RT400W-D82" is printed on a label attached to the bottom of the device.
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=23477&sid=71635044c823627915b1c0ad74b7910d On the DD-WRT forums] (internal images) :The Flash is assumed to be a MX29LV320ATTC-90 based on the specifications and visible text on the chip.. [http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-19410-1-1.html On right.com.cn forums]
'''WARPSTAR-XXXXXX-A''' is presumed to be the 5GHz default SSID.
